PilgrimSetting.AlwaysShowProInstrumentTrackSelection_De: Always show Pro parts in Festival's Part Selector, even when no instrument has been detected.
PilgrimSetting.EnableAutoCalibration_Description: Automatically improve Input Latency as you play.
PilgrimSetting.TrackBackgroundOpacity_Description: Darken the background during Festival gameplay.
PilgrimSetting.EnableGuitarMode_Description: Enables the binding layout for a guitar peripheral
PilgrimSetting.MobilePortraitTrackLayout_Name: Main Stage Mobile Gameplay Track Layout
PilgrimSetting.MobileGameplayOrientationMode_Descriptio: Main Stage gameplay has been optimized on mobile for vertically-oriented screens. Select "Landscape" only if you choose to play Main Stage horizontally.
PilgrimSetting.VideoLatency_Description:
Manually enter a video latency value for gameplay in Festival.

If you aren't sure, go through the Tune-Up process in the Game Menu backstage.
PilgrimSetting.AudioLatency_Description:
Manually enter an audio latency value for gameplay in Festival.

If you aren't sure, go through the Tune-Up process in the Game Menu backstage.
PilgrimSetting.AutoEmoteDuringResults_Description: Play a random emote during the Main Stage results sequence.
PilgrimSetting.UseGuitarLeftyFlip_Description: Reverse the order of the lanes in Festival.
PilgrimSetting.Pilgrim_SelectPreset_Description: Select a preset for gameplay in the Main Stage
PilgrimSetting.TrackSpeed_Description: Set the speed of the Festival gameplay track.
PilgrimSetting.MobilePortraitTrackLayout_Description: Set the track angle that best fits your play style on mobile. "Low angle" works for most players. "High angle" is optimized for players with larger hands, and/or prefer to be closer to the device's center of balance.
PilgrimSetting.NonProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Name: Show Button Labels (Lead, Bass, Drums, Vocals)
PilgrimSetting.NonProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Name_PS: Show Button Labels (Lead, Bass, Drums, Vocals)
PilgrimSetting.NonProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Name_Sw: Show Button Labels (Lead, Bass, Drums, Vocals)
PilgrimSetting.ProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Name: Show Button Labels (Pro Lead, Pro Bass)
PilgrimSetting.ProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Name_PS4_P: Show Button Labels (Pro Lead, Pro Bass)
PilgrimSetting.ProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Name_Switc: Show Button Labels (Pro Lead, Pro Bass)
PilgrimSetting.ShowStreakCounter_Description: Show a counter when a streak of 50 notes has been achieved. The counter increments until you break your streak.
PilgrimSetting.ShowDetailedNotePlayFeedback_Description: Show extra feedback that includes Good notes in addition to Perfect notes.
PilgrimSetting.UseProColorsForAllParts_Description: Show multicolored notes when playing Lead, Bass, Drums, or Vocals.
PilgrimSetting.NonProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Descrip: Show reminders about the controls when playing Lead, Bass, Drums, or Vocals.
PilgrimSetting.ProTrackInputButtonVisibility_Descriptio: Show reminders about the controls when playing Pro Lead or Pro Bass.
PilgrimSetting.ShowLiftNoteConnectors_Description: Show track visuals that connect Lift Notes to their preceding notes.
PilgrimSetting.CalibrationProfile_Description: Switches between different sets of Audio/Video Offset and Input Latency values. Useful for Festival players who use multiple audiovisual setups.
PilgrimSetting.MobileGameplayOrientationModeInteraction: This setting cannot be modified during gameplay.
PilgrimSetting.GuitarModeEditCondition_Description: This setting is disabled because 'Guitar Mode' setting is enabled!
PilgrimSetting.EnableVibrationForHittingNotes_Descripti: Turns the controller's vibration feature when hitting notes on/off.
PilgrimSetting.UseAlternative5LaneTouchLayout_Descripti: Turns the usage of an alternative 5-lane touch layout on/off. When on, the left side of the screen will be presented with 3 (three) buttons instead of 2 (two), and when playing a 5-lane song. The button for the third lane will be available on both sides of the screen. When off, the left side of the screen will be presented with 2 (two) buttons when playing a 5-lane song.
PilgrimSetting.EnableMobileExpandedTrack_Description: Turns the usage of an expanded track on/off. When on, a wider Festival gameplay track will be used with no on screen buttons and touch input will be done directly on each lane. When off, on screen touch buttons will be used with a narrower Festival gameplay track.
PilgrimSetting.UseProColorsForAllParts_Name: Use Pro Colors for All Parts
